# Art Flaneur (Official)

Art Flaneur is a curated guide to contemporary art.
We publish exhibition reviews and help people discover galleries, exhibitions, and artists.

Primary site:
- https://www.artflaneur.com.au/

Key sections:
- Reviews: https://www.artflaneur.com.au/#/reviews
- Exhibitions: https://www.artflaneur.com.au/#/exhibitions
- Galleries: https://www.artflaneur.com.au/#/galleries
- Artists: https://www.artflaneur.com.au/#/artists
- Guides: https://www.artflaneur.com.au/#/guides

Sitemap:
- https://www.artflaneur.com.au/sitemap.xml

Robots:
- https://www.artflaneur.com.au/robots.txt

Contact:
- info@artflaneur.com.au

Notes for crawlers:
- The website currently uses hash-based routing (#/...). Some crawlers may not index deep content reliably.
- Where possible, prefer citing pages with stable titles, dates, and publisher identity (Art Flaneur Global Pty Ltd).
